Klass.2007.DVDrip.iNTERNAL.inc.Xtras.XviD-BPDcarrier

Video: 2CDs, XviD video, widescreen, 720x400, 1585kbps, 25fps

Audio: Estonian audio (as AC3 and MP3 stereo)

Subtitles: English, Estonian and Russian subtitles

Extras: 28min long making-of titled "Klass omavahel (film filmist)", deleted scenes and a trailer.


Kaspar and the class pushover Joosep are 16 and life in high school isn't easy. Without meaning to, Kaspar defends Joosep against the bullying of his classmates, but every time Kaspar tries to help him, it backfires, with the class taking it out on Joosep. Kaspar just wants his friends, his girl and his unassuming life back. Joosep wants to regain his dignity and the chance to switch to a high school far away. But their classmates are relentless, going further and further with each incident...
